title: UNHCR in Bangladesh
subtitle:
To mark #WorldToiletDay2019, UNHCR & partners held a WASH Fair in Kutupalong refugee settlement opened by the Govt. 

WASH = 

Water
Sanitation 
&
Hygiene 
#WASH is a key priority in Cox's Bazar.

UNHCR has provided more than 20,200 latrine facilities for #refugees. pic.twitter.com/gLWsxxYRYz

title: UNHCR in Bangladesh
subtitle:
UNHCR has launched a new & innovative way of providing Core Relief Items to #Rohingya refugees. 

Refugees receive Vouchers with points which they can use to select the items they want, based on their own & their families individual needs, enhancing individual #autonomy & dignitypic.twitter.com/MklZ3LNyeB
